mapper.insert: insert into menu( menu_no, res_no, menu_name, menu_price, menu_content) values(menu_seq.nextval, #{resNo}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuInfo})
mapper.select: select m.menu_no, m.menu_name, m.menu_price, m.menu_content, r.res_name FROM menu m LEFT OUTER JOIN restaurant r ON m.res_no = r.res_no WHERE m.res_no = #{resNo}
